meanings.definition: Having unlimited or universal power or authority.
meanings.sent1: The superhero was omnicompetent, able to defeat any villain with ease.
meanings.sent2: The king's omnicompetent rule ensured peace and prosperity in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The omnicompetent wizard could make a rabbit disappear and reappear at will.
meanings.sent4: Her omnicompetent presence in the room commanded respect from all who entered.
meanings.sent5: The omnicompetent sun illuminated the entire valley with its warm rays.

meanings.definition: Capable of handling any task or responsibility.
meanings.sent1: The omnicompetent assistant efficiently managed all the office duties.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter's omnicompetent skills saved many lives during the blaze.
meanings.sent3: Even the omnicompetent robot couldn't fix the broken coffee machine.
meanings.sent4: Her omnicompetent multitasking abilities amazed everyone in the office.
meanings.sent5: The omnicompetent chef effortlessly prepared a feast for the entire party.
